Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the temporary appointment of heads of departments without the advice and consent of the senate
Summary: Relates to the temporary appointment of heads of departments without the advice and consent of the senate and sets time limits for serving in such capacity.
LawCode: Add ยง33-b, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the temporary appointment of heads of departments without the advice and consent of the senate
